title: Ping Issues (Riot and Suddenlink)
body: Hello, for quite sometime now there has been massive ping issues between 6pm and about 9pm MST this has occurred everyday and for awhile. When the ping issue hits it sustains 250+ for awhile. I was wondering what the issue was and how can this be resolved? Any other time the ping is fine. And this has happened to multiple people who live my area. I used wifi and hardline and it doesn't change a thing.

replies.body: SAME exact problem here. been going on for months, already have TRACERTS and log info. RIOT employee told me its not me, its suddenlinks routing to RIOT servers. Riot PLEASE get on their asses because they straight up ignore me every time I call and believe me I have called multiple times. It's ruining league for a lot of us here in the arizona area.

It sounds like your network could be having trouble maintaining a strong connection, which could happen for a few reasons.  For your specific case, your ISP might be re-routing your connection to our server during that time period, and could be causing input delay.  As a first step to rule out possibilities, I suggest going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your network is running strong and able to keep a constant connection while in-game.  Let me know if you still have an issue!
